item.title: 普京和习近平为何是 "好朋友"？
item.description: 中俄两国数百年来一直是竞争对手，现在却结成了事实上的联盟，尽管还没有达到习近平主席和普京总统在2022年2月俄罗斯入侵乌克兰前几周刚刚设定的 "无限制 "的高标准。这两个世界上最强大的独裁国家在过去十年间建立的经济、军事和政治联系因战争而得到了发展，尽管中俄两国都希望至少在一定程度上颠覆美国主导的冷战后秩序。【原文：Rivals for centuries, China and Russia now have a de facto alliance, even if it’s failed to reach the high “no limits” bar that Presidents Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin set just weeks before Russia’s invasion of Ukraine in February 2022. The economic, military and political ties nurtured over the past decade between the world’s two most powerful authoritarian states — both of which aim to upend at least parts of the US-dominated post-Cold War order — have grown as a result of the war, despite Ch】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安认为美联储将悄然采纳更高的通胀目标：监督
item.description:
布隆伯格观点专栏作家穆罕默德-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）表示，美联储正处于窘境之中

。【原文：

Bloomberg Opinion columnist Mohamed El-Erian says the Federal Reserve is in a quandary

】

item.title: 国债市场迎来转折点，美联储减息之路已然明朗
item.description: 全球最大的债券市场正迎来一个转折点，随着交易商开始接受今年三次降息的想法，美国国债一扫 2024 年的跌势。【原文：The world’s biggest bond market is reaching a turning point, with US Treasuries wiping out their 2024 losses as traders start to embrace the idea of three interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 陷入困境的加密货币贷款机构 Abra 收购 Valkyrie 私人信托基金
item.description: 加密货币交易平台 Abra 表示，它已从 Valkyrie Investments 收购了几家私人加密货币信托公司，而就在不久前，Valkyrie Investments 因在没有适当许可证的情况下开展业务而与美国 25 个州的金融监管机构达成了和解。【原文：Crypto trading platform Abra said it had acquired several private cryptocurrency trusts from Valkyrie Investments, shortly before it settled with 25 US state financial regulators for operating without appropriate licenses.】

item.title: Kaszek 和 Andreessen 支持阿根廷金融科技公司 Tapi 完成 2200 万美元融资
item.description: 阿根廷金融技术初创公司 Tapi 在由 Kaszek 领投的 A 轮融资中获得了 2200 万美元的风险投资，公司联合创始人兼首席执行官 Tomas Mindlin 表示，公司将在墨西哥拓展业务。【原文：Argentine financial technology startup Tapi raised $22 million in venture funding in a Series A round led by Kaszek as the company expands its operations in Mexico, co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Tomas Mindlin said.】

item.title: 刚果首次提供来自合资企业的自有钴产品
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的国有矿业公司正试图出售其在一个合资项目中的钴份额，因为该国正在寻求对能源转型关键金属的更多控制权。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s state miner is trying to sell its share of cobalt from a joint-venture project, as the country seeks more control over metals key to the energy transition.】

item.title: 交易员开始押注美联储 9 月超大规模降息
item.description: 债券交易商正在加大押注，认为美联储将在 9 月份降息半个百分点，而不是标准的四分之一个百分点。【原文：Bond traders are ramping up bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by half a percentage point in September instead of the standard quarter-point increment.】

item.title: 银行计划为赛诺菲消费者产品销售提供 60 亿欧元债务融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Banks including Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley are lining up more than €6 billion ($6.5 billion) of debt financing for would—be buyers of Sanofi’s consumer health division, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于建筑成本上升，ADM 放弃与 LG 化学的合资项目
item.description: 由于成本过高，农业巨头 Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司已停止与 LG 化学有限公司合资生产生物塑料等植物基产品的材料。【原文：Agricultural giant Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. has halted its joint ventures with LG Chem Ltd. to make materials for plant-based products such as bioplastics due to high costs.】

item.title: 债权人反击新债券销售中的资产剥离行为
item.description: 宽松货币时代盛行的宽松债券文件使投资者在近期的债务交易中容易受到资产剥离的影响。现在，他们开始反击了。【原文：Loose bond documentation that flourished in the easy-money era has left investors vulnerable to asset stripping in recent debt deals. Now they’re fighting back.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统在发生致命抗议事件后任命代理警察局长
item.description: 在肯尼亚警方残酷镇压反税示威活动并造成至少 41 人死亡三周后，肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托周五任命了新的安全主管，以平息东非工业化程度最高的经济体的动乱。【原文：Three weeks after a brutal police crackdown on anti-tax demonstrations in Kenya that left at least 41 people dead, President William Ruto on Friday named new security chiefs as seeks to quell unrest in East Africa’s most industrialized economy.】

item.title: 航空业前景黯淡，空客启动成本节约计划
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）已开始实施一项计划，以提高其业绩并控制成本，从而应对供应链限制和不断增长的开支。【原文：Airbus SE has embarked on a plan to improve its performance and keep costs in check in response to supply-chain constraints and rising expenses.】

item.title: Carpetright 濒临破产，1800 个零售岗位岌岌可危
item.description: Carpetright 有限公司正准备进入破产程序，这将使 1800 多个工作岗位面临风险，因为该零售连锁店正在寻找买家。【原文：Carpetright Ltd. is preparing to enter into insolvency proceedings, putting more than 1,800 jobs at risk as the retail chain looks for a buyer.】

item.title: 津巴布韦银行家支持在 2030 年前采用 ZiG 作为唯一货币的计划
item.description: 津巴布韦的银行支持在当前的 2030 年目标日期之前采用 ZiG 作为国家的唯一货币，前提是以金银为支撑的货币单位所带来的经济稳定性得以维持。【原文：Zimbabwe’s banks support adopting the ZiG as the nation’s sole currency before the current target date of 2030, provided the economic stability which the bullion-backed unit has delivered is maintained.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称美国政治威胁美联储 9 月缩表机会
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，美国大选后通胀政策冲击的威胁降低了美联储 9 月份降息的可能性。【原文：The odds of a September interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve are tempered by the threat of an inflationary policy shock after the US election, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 贡渥集团将在牛市结束后向亚洲运输北海原油
item.description: 贡渥集团将把一艘满载北海四十年代原油的超级油轮运往亚洲，此前该贸易公司在长达一个月的牛市行情中积累了大量基准石油。【原文：Gunvor Group will send a supertanker loaded with North Sea Forties crude to Asia after the trading house amassed a large volume of benchmark oil in a month-long bull play.】

item.title: 印度外汇储备在债券纳入后一周创历史新高
item.description: 在印度主权债务被纳入摩根大通新兴市场指数一周后，印度的外汇储备创下历史新高。【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves touched an all-time high a week after the country’s sovereign debt was included in a key JPMorgan Chase & Co. emerging market index.】

item.title: 米莱伊回调休克疗法，控制阿根廷通货膨胀
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统正在为他的休克疗法计划踩刹车，以期在阿根廷暗淡的经济现实中稳住民众的支持，即使这意味着令市场不安。【原文：President Javier Milei is tapping the brakes on his shock therapy program in a bid to hold on to popular support amid Argentina’s bleak economic reality, even if it means unsettling markets.】

item.title: 德国计划向 KNDS 订购 100 多门轮式榴弹炮
item.description: 德国正计划从法德防务承包商 KNDS 订购 100 多门拳击手自行榴弹炮，这是执政联盟大规模军事扩张的最新一笔大宗采购。【原文：Germany is planning to order more than 100 Boxer self-propelled howitzers from Franco-German defense contractor KNDS, the latest big-ticket purchase as part of a major military expansion by the ruling coalition.】

item.title: 芬兰通过驱逐法在俄罗斯边境拦截移民
item.description: 芬兰议会投票赞成一项法律，允许北欧国家击退俄罗斯派往其边境的移民，这是莫斯科混合战争的一部分。【原文：Finland’s parliament voted in favor of a law that allows the Nordic country to push back migrants that Russia sends to its border as part of Moscow’s hybrid warfare.】

item.title: 印度 6 月通胀加速，暂停加息正当合理
item.description: 印度的通胀率在 6 月份加速上升，为央行决定在更长时间内维持较高利率提供了理由。【原文：India’s inflation accelerated in June, justifying the central bank’s decision to keep interest rates higher for longer.】

item.title: 得益于尼曼-萨克斯的交易，巴尼斯计划卷土重来
item.description: 巴尼斯纽约百货公司（Barneys New York）长期以来深受纽约富人的喜爱，直到 2019 年才因破产关闭了麦迪逊大道旗舰店和其他美国分店。【原文：Barneys New York, the department store long beloved by rich New Yorkers before a 2019 bankruptcy shuttered its Madison Avenue flagship and other US outlets, is gearing up for a revival of sorts at outposts in Manhattan and beyond.】

item.title: KKR 和 Palm Capital 从 Catena 手中收购丹麦物流地产
item.description: KKR & Co.和 Palm Capital Ltd.成为投资公司收购北欧房地产资产的最新例证，该行业去年因借贷成本大幅飙升而陷入困境。【原文：KKR & Co. and Palm Capital Ltd. have become the latest example of investment firms picking up Nordic real estate assets in an industry that was crippled by a sharp jump in borrowing costs last year.】

item.title: Cucinelli 股价下滑预示奢侈品行业将迎来艰难的业绩季
item.description: 市场对 Brunello Cucinelli SpA 公司第二季度稳健盈利的消极反应是欧洲奢侈品公司的一个不祥之兆。【原文：Markets’ downbeat reaction to Brunello Cucinelli SpA’s solid second-quarter earnings is an ominous sign for Europe’s luxury goods companies, which likely face a tough slog this results season to placate investors’ concerns for the sector.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行寻求返还用于提高储备金的资金
item.description: 土耳其央行正在努力归还外国同行的存款，同时减少在硬通货缓冲压力下积累的负债。【原文：The Turkish central bank is working to return deposits placed by foreign counterparts as it brings down the liabilities accumulated when its hard currency buffers were under pressure.】

item.title: 联合利华将在 2025 年前裁减三分之一的欧洲办公室职位
item.description: 联合利华集团（Unilever Plc）将在欧洲裁减三分之一的办公室员工，该消费品集团正推进在全球范围内裁减 7500 个工作岗位的计划。【原文：Unilever Plc is cutting a third of its office staff in Europe, as the consumer goods group pushes ahead with plans to slash 7,500 jobs worldwide.】

item.title: 习近平的粮食安全新举措从中国的田间地头开始
item.description:
这个幅员辽阔的国家拥有全球五分之一的人口，但耕地面积却不到全球的十分之一。北京希望调整这种不平衡。【原文：

The vast nation has a fifth of the global population but less than a 10th of the world’s arable land. Beijing wants to adjust the imbalance.

】

item.title: 汇丰银行撤回交易员对卡塔尔经济的负面研究报告
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，汇丰控股公司今年早些时候收回了一份对卡塔尔经济作出悲观评估的备忘录，并在几天后发出了对卡塔尔经济前景更为乐观的研究报告。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc retracted a memo offering a downbeat assessment of Qatar’s economy earlier this year and sent out research that offered a more positive outlook days later, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 汉莎航空因票价疲软削减盈利目标；启动节约计划
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）下调了全年利润预期，并警告说，由于要应对更高的单位成本和机票价格下跌，其同名德国航空公司实现收支平衡将 "越来越具有挑战性"。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG cut its profit outlook for the full year and warned that breaking even at its namesake German carrier will be “increasingly challenging” as it grapples with higher unit costs and falling ticket prices.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。大家都在关注美国银行业的收益，国债又开始流行起来，而日本则在货币方面掀起了波澜。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. All eyes are on US bank earnings, Treasuries are back in vogue and Japan makes waves in currencies. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】
